snippet: The International Monetary Fund lowered its world economic growth outlooks for 2013 and 2014.
abstract: Stocks slump after the International Monetary Fund predicts weaker world economic growth and as investors wait for what they expect to be a disappointing series of corporate earnings reports.
lead_paragraph: The International Monetary Fund lowered its world economic growth outlooks for 2013 and 2014.

headline.seo: I.M.F.’s Weak Economic Outlook Hampers Market
